about_the_game: This soundtrack features 11 tracks from Reverse x Reverse, featuring music by Alice Yukiduki and mimi2uk. Whether your squashing bugs in Reverse x Reverse or relaxing away from your computer, add these smooth electronic beats to your playlist!
